title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5119 - Video Lottery Terminal Component Standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5119 - Video Lottery Terminal Component Standards

State Regulations
§ 5119.1 - Terminal identification requirements
§ 5119.2 - Video lottery terminal drop boxes
§ 5119.3 - Voucher standards

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5119

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
